shloka:
द्रोणं च भीष्मं च जयद्रथं च
कर्णं तथाऽन्यानपि योधवीरान्।
मया हतांस्त्वं जहि मा व्यथिष्ठा
युध्यस्व जेतासि रणे सपत्नान्।।11.34।।
translation: 11.34 Drona, Bhishma, Jayadratha, Karna and other brave warriors  these are already slain by Me: do thou kill; be not distressed with fear; fight and thou shalt coner thy enemies in battle.
